title: Gets an AFK for leaving in champion select, even though it never opened??
body: Wut...like...wut. I clicked to play a game ok. It lags ok. It closes out ok. it says I am in champion select when I am not ok. Log out, ok. Go back in, AFK, wut! Explain? This is a {{champion:119}} move bruh.

replies.body:
It sounds a lot like your client was having a hard time staying connected to the PvP.net service. If this is the case, it can cause queue pops to not come up, kick you from champ select, or even crash your client entirely. Most of the time this happens if you have local network settings that don't play nicely with League. To ensure your local setup is good, I suggest following the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you continue to have this issue.
